description:
The easy-to-use SB6180 SURFboard eXtreme Cable Modem unlocks the potential of offering innovative high-bandwidth data and multimedia services to customers.

The SB6180 is the ideal competitive solution for the high-end residential user, the small home office owner, as well as for the medium-to-large business enterprise.

Utilizing the power of DOCSIS 3.0, the SB6180 enables channel bonding of up to 8 downstream channels and 4 upstream channels, which allows an operator to offer their customers advanced multimedia services with data rates of well over 300 Mbps in DOCSIS mode and 400 Mbps in EuroDOCSIS mode for downstream and 120 Mbps upstream.
title: Motorola SB6180 SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem
